availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Consisted of Mason, Lewis, Greenup, Boyd, Fleming, Rowan, Carter, Lawrence, Bath, Morgan, Clark, Montgomery, Powell, Wolfe, Magoffin counties between 1861 and 1863. Johnson, Floyd, and Pike counties were added between 1863 and 1865. Clark and Wolfe counties were removed from 1863 to 1865. Represented by Laban T. Moore from 1859 to 1861. Represented by William H. Wadsworth from 1861 to 1865. Represented by Samuel McKee from 1865 to 1867.

ab.bibl:
Patrick Lewis, “Visualizing Unionism: Congressional Redistricting in 1861,” Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition blog, April 27, 2016, https://civilwargovernors.org/visualizing-unionism-congressional-redistricting-in-1861/ (accessed December 26, 2019).
“Congressional and Judicial District Maps, Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition, http://discovery.civilwargovernors.org/congressional-and-judicial-district-maps (accessed December 26, 2019).
KYR-0004-033-0003.
